description: Dashbord works with postgres_exporter for prometheus

panels.description: Number of rows inserted by queries in this database, Number of rows updated by queries in this database, Number of rows deleted by queries in this database
panels.title: Top Changes (INSERT/UPDATE/DELETE)

panels.description: Replication last transaction replay behind master in seconds
panels.title: Last Transaction Replay

panels.description: Number of transactions in this database that have been committed
panels.title: Top Transaction Commits

panels.description: Replication lag behind master in bytes
panels.title: Replication Lag

panels.description: Number of transactions in this database that have been rolled back
panels.title: Top Transaction Rollbacks

panels.description: Max duration in seconds any active transaction has been running
panels.title: Longest Transaction

panels.description: Top filesystems filled, in percent across selected Device Host(s)
panels.title: Top Filesystem Fill

panels.description: Percentage towards transaction ID wraparound, fatal to database if exhausted
panels.title: % to XID Wraparound

panels.description: Number of queries canceled due to conflicts with recovery in this database. (Conflicts occur only on standby servers). Number of deadlocks detected in this database.
panels.title: Conflicts/Deadlocks

panels.description: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to dropped tablespaces
panels.title: Due to Dropped Tables

panels.description: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to lock timeouts
panels.title: Due to Lock Timeouts

panels.description: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to old snapshots
panels.title: Due to Old Snapshots

panels.description: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to pinned buffers
panels.title: Due to Pinned Buffers

panels.description: Number of queries in this database that have been canceled due to deadlocks
panels.title: Due to Deadlocks

panels.description: Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are written to disk
panels.title: Top BGWriter Checkpoint Write Time

panels.description: Total amount of time that has been spent in the portion of checkpoint processing where files are synchronized to disk
panels.title: Top BGWriter Checkpoint Sync Time

panels.description: Number of buffers written during checkpoints
panels.title: Top BGWriter Buffers Checkpoint

panels.description: Number of buffers written by the background writer
panels.title: Top BGWriter Buffers Clean

panels.description: Number of rows inserted by queries in this database
panels.title: Top Tuples Inserted

panels.description: Number of rows updated by queries in this database
panels.title: Top Tuples Updated

panels.description: Number of rows deleted by queries in this database
panels.title: Top Tuples Deleted

panels.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table
panels.title: Top Disk Blocks Read

panels.description: Number of buffer hits in this table
panels.title: Top Buffer Hits

panels.description: Number of disk blocks read from all indexes on this table
panels.title: Top Disk Blocks Read from Indexes

panels.description: Number of buffer hits in all indexes on this table
panels.title: Top Buffer Hits from Indexes

panels.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table's TOAST table (if any)
panels.title: Top Disk Blocks Read from TOAST Table

panels.description: Number of buffer hits in this table's TOAST table (if any)
panels.title: Top Buffer Hits from TOAST Table

panels.description: Number of disk blocks read from this table's TOAST table indexes (if any)
panels.title: Top Disk Blocks Read from TOAST Indexes

panels.description: Number of buffer hits in this table's TOAST table indexes (if any)
panels.title: Top Buffer Hits from TOAST Indexes

targets.expr: topk(1, sum(pg_locks_count{datname=~"$datname", server=~"$server", mode=~"$mode"}) by (server, datname, mode))

panels.description: Number of sequential scans initiated on this table
panels.title: Top Sequential Scans

panels.description: Estimated number of dead rows
panels.title: Top Dead Tuples

panels.description: Number of live rows fetched by sequential scans
panels.title: Top Rows Read by Sequential Scans

panels.description: Number of rows inserted
panels.title: Top Rows Inserted

panels.description: Number of index scans initiated on this table
panels.title: Top Index Scans

panels.description: Number of rows updated
panels.title: Top Rows Updated

panels.description: Number of live rows fetched by index scans
panels.title: Top Rows Read by Index Scans

panels.description: Number of rows deleted
panels.title: Top Rows Deleted

panels.description: Last time at which this table was analyzed by the autovacuum daemon
panels.title: Oldest Auto Analyze

panels.description: Number of times this table has been vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon
panels.title: Top Auto Vacuum Count

panels.description: Number of times this table has been analyzed by the autovacuum daemon
panels.title: Lowest Non-Zero Auto Analyze Count

panels.description: Last time at which this table was vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon
panels.title: Oldest Auto Vacuum

panels.description: Number of times this table has been analyzed by the autovacuum daemon
panels.title: Top Auto Analyze Count

panels.description: Number of times this table has been vacuumed by the autovacuum daemon
panels.title: Lowest Non-Zero Auto Vacuum Count

panels.description: Last time at which this table was manually analyzed
panels.title: Oldest Manual Analyze

panels.description: Number of times this table has been manually analyzed
panels.title: Top Manual Analyze Count

panels.description: Number of times this table has been manually analyzed
panels.title: Lowest Non-Zero Manual Analyze Count

panels.description: Last time at which this table was manually vacuumed (not counting VACUUM FULL)
panels.title: Oldest Manual Vacuum

panels.description: Number of times this table has been manually vacuumed (not counting VACUUM FULL)
panels.title: Top Manual Vacuum Count

panels.description: Number of times this table has been manually vacuumed (not counting VACUUM FULL)
panels.title: Lowest Non-Zero Manual Vacuum Count

panels.description: Percentage towards emergency autovacuum process starting
panels.title: % to Emergency Vacuum

targets.expr: bottomk(2, sum(pg_stat_database_blks_hit{server=~"$server", datname=~"$datname"}) by (server,datname) / (sum(pg_stat_database_blks_read{server=~"$server", datname=~"$datname"}) by (server,datname) + sum(pg_stat_database_blks_hit{server=~"$server", datname=~"$datname"}) by (server,datname))) < 99

title: PostgreSQL Databases
